welcome.title: Welcome!
welcome.text: I'm a full-stack web developer (MERN stack). Take a look my profile and app examples. I also like cooking, drawing and playing with alchemy üíªüçîüé®‚öóÔ∏è

tech.title: Technologies
tech.msg: Hover over each technology to watch its description.

angular.name: Angular
angular.desc: Traditional front-end framework to create components.

html.name: HTML
html.desc: Markup language to create web pages

css.name: CSS
css.desc: Style Sheet language to create the presentation of a document written in a markup language such as HTML.

rest.name: REST
rest.desc: Standard for writting APIs. Consist on access resources using HTTP protocol.

graphql.name: GraphQL
graphql.desc: Standard for writting APIs. Consist on querying a data model using a language. We only use one endpoint instead of several ones as an API REST.

figma.name: Figma
figma.desc: Design App to create UI or other grpahics.

storybook.name: Storybook
storybook.desc: App to create a component catalogue.

apollo.name: Apollo
apollo.desc: Library for building GraphQL in back-end.

express.name: Express
express.desc: Node library for building an API REST.

exp.title: Experience
exp.text: I have been working on web development for more than 8 years. When I was younger I used to like creating webs in the HTML4 ages. I decided study computing engeneering and I made web developing freelancer jobs. When I finished, I started a small stage as a mobile developer. Finally, I decided to head in web development again and I have specialized in the front-end until now. Mainly I have been working in consulting inside medium and large company projects such us Odigeo, Inditext or the EUIPO/WIPO.

lionmiss.title: Lion Miss
lionmiss.desc: Example online shop. At the moment It is formed with projects shown in Github, Swagger, visor GraphQL and Storybook.

cheety.title: Cheety
cheety.desc: Gather notes and knowledge related to develope.

personalPage.title: Web Personal
personalPage.desc: It's the same website. You can find my professional work.

animalRescue.title: Animal Rescue
animalRescue.desc: Example of several project created using differents front-end frameworks and libraries.
